index.title: Ghost Weight | Weight Tracking Without the Numbers
index.description: An iOS app that tracks weight changes, not the actual numbers. Free yourself from the pressure of the scale and focus only on your progress.

hero.subtitle: A tracking app focused on change
hero.description: Stop obsessing over "the number." Enjoy tracking only "the change" — the most stress-free way to manage your weight.

philosophy.title: No more ups and downs.
philosophy.description:
Transform stepping on the scale from "scary" to "exciting."
Ghost Weight is a weight management app that cares about your mental well-being.

card1.title: Only the difference from baseline is shown.
card1.description: Focus on positive changes like "I'm down from yesterday!" or "Look how much I've changed this week!" Stay motivated naturally and build lasting habits.

card2.title: Rock-solid privacy protection
card2.description: No worries if someone sees your screen. Built-in Face ID / Touch ID biometric lock keeps your secrets safe, always.

card3.title: See the "trend," not the "point"
card3.description: Beautiful, intuitive graphs and calendar help you understand long-term changes. Don't stress over daily fluctuations — see the bigger picture. Record in 1 second, even on busy mornings.

feature1.title: No numbers, just change.
feature1.description: Your actual weight is never shown — only the difference from your baseline. Keep going without the mental burden.

feature2.title: See your progress at a glance.
feature2.description: Smooth graphs show your trends. Easy weekly and monthly reviews.

feature3.title: Every "done" builds confidence.
feature3.description: Track your journey on the calendar. Feel the joy of consistency.

cta.description:
Completely free, no ads.
No annoying registration required.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: Ghost Weight ("the App") is a weight management app provided by Shoho Kozawa ("the Developer"). This Privacy Policy explains how the App handles your information.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.stored2: Difference from baseline (not your actual weight)
dataCollection.notStoredTitle: Information the App does NOT store
dataCollection.notStored1: Personal information such as name or email address
dataCollection.simple: We only store what's needed for weight tracking. We never store personal information like your name or email.

dataStorage.title: Where Your Data is Stored
dataStorage.text: All data recorded in the App is stored only on your iPhone/iPad. We never send data to the Developer's servers.
dataStorage.simple: Your data stays on your phone only. It never goes out to the internet.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Sharing
thirdParty.text1: The App does not provide, sell, or share your data with any third parties. Since we currently don't display ads, no data is shared with advertising companies.
thirdParty.text2: We may introduce ads in the future. If so, we will notify you in advance through the App and by updating this Privacy Policy.
thirdParty.simple: We don't sell or show your data to anyone. If we ever add ads, we'll let you know first.

security.title: Security
security.text: The App includes the following measures to protect your privacy:
security.item1: Face ID / Touch ID biometric lock
security.simple: Lock the app with Face ID or Touch ID. Your records stay protected even if someone sees your phone.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.text: The App does not intentionally collect personal information from children under 13. In fact, the App is designed not to collect any personal information at all. If you're a parent with questions, please contact us.

deletion.title: Data Deletion
deletion.text: Deleting the App also deletes all stored data. Since no data exists on the Developer's servers, uninstalling the App completely removes everything.
deletion.simple: Delete the app, and all your data is gone. Nothing stays behind anywhere.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.text: This Privacy Policy may be updated as needed. We'll notify you of important changes through the App or on this page. Continued use of the App after changes means you accept the updated policy.

service.text: The App is designed to record and manage weight changes. It provides the following features:
